Gharanī：A woman，lay-disciple of the Buddha．She had attained the Third Fruit of the Path and when the Buddha was about to perform theTwin Miracle，she offered to perform a miracle herself - to transform the earth into water and dive about in it like a water-bird．DhA.iii.209．

There was a Gharanī Stūpa near Suppāraka （Divy.47）.
